statements: SELECT factory_id, production_date, product_id, quantity, defect_count FROM factory_production_data
SELECT * FROM factory_production_data WHERE factory_id = 1
SELECT product_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM factory_production_data GROUP BY product_id
SELECT factory_id, production_date FROM factory_production_data ORDER BY production_date DESC
SELECT factory_id, production_date FROM factory_production_data WHERE defect_count > 0 ORDER BY defect_count ASC, production_date
SELECT factory_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM factory_production_data GROUP BY factory_id
SELECT product_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity, AVG(defect_count) AS avg_defect_count FROM factory_production_data GROUP BY product_id
SELECT production_date, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity, SUM(defect_count) AS total_defects FROM factory_production_data GROUP BY production_date HAVING total_quantity > 1000
SELECT factory_id, product_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM factory_production_data WHERE production_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' GROUP BY factory_id, product_id
SELECT product_id, MAX(quantity) AS max_quantity, MIN(defect_count) AS min_defect_count FROM factory_production_data GROUP BY product_id ORDER BY max_quantity DESC, min_defect_count ASC
SELECT id, factory_id, product_name, production_date FROM ProductionData;
SELECT * FROM ProductionData WHERE id = 1;
SELECT product_name, production_date FROM ProductionData ORDER BY production_date DESC;
SELECT factory_name, location, employee_count FROM FactoryInformation WHERE employee_count > 100;
SELECT factory_id, factory_name, location FROM FactoryInformation ORDER BY factory_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM ProductionData WHERE factory_id = 1
SELECT product_name, production_date FROM ProductionData ORDER BY production_date DESC
SELECT factory_name, location FROM FactoryInformation WHERE employee_count > 100 ORDER BY factory_name
SELECT factory_name, location, employee_count FROM FactoryInformation WHERE location LIKE '%New York%'
SELECT p.product_name, f.factory_name FROM ProductionData p JOIN FactoryInformation f ON p.factory_id = f.factory_id
SELECT * FROM Factory_Information;
SELECT factory_name, location FROM Factory_Information WHERE production_capacity > 1000;
SELECT * FROM Production_Records ORDER BY production_date DESC;

SELECT factory_name, SUM(produced_quantity) AS total_production FROM Factory_Information JOIN Production_Records ON Factory_Information.factory_id = Production_Records.factory_id GROUP BY factory_name;

SELECT factory_name, defect_type, severity FROM Factory_Information JOIN Production_Records ON Factory_Information.factory_id = Production_Records.factory_id JOIN Quality_Checks ON Production_Records.record_id = Quality_Checks.record_id WHERE severity > 5;
SELECT * FROM Factory_Information;
SELECT factory_name, location FROM Factory_Information ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT production_date, produced_quantity FROM Production_Records WHERE produced_quantity > 100 ORDER BY production_date ASC;

SELECT fi.factory_name, pr.production_date, qc.defect_type FROM Factory_Information fi JOIN Production_Records pr ON fi.factory_id = pr.factory_id JOIN Quality_Checks qc ON pr.record_id = qc.record_id;
SELECT MAX(production_capacity) AS max_capacity FROM Factory_Information;
SELECT * FROM Factory_1
SELECT Factory_Name, Production_Quantity FROM Factory_2
SELECT Factory_Name, Production_Line FROM Factory_3 WHERE Production_Line='Line A'
SELECT Factory_Name FROM Factory_4 ORDER BY Factory_Name DESC
SELECT * FROM Factory_1 WHERE Production_Quantity >= 100
SELECT Factory_Name, Production_Line, Production_Quantity FROM Factory_1 WHERE Production_Quantity > 100 ORDER BY Production_Quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM Factory_2 WHERE Production_Line = 'Assembly Line';
SELECT Factory_Name, Production_Line FROM Factory_3 WHERE Production_Quantity BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY Factory_Name ASC;
SELECT Factory_ID, Production_Quantity FROM Factory_4 WHERE Factory_ID IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT DISTINCT Factory_Name FROM Factory_1 WHERE Production_Quantity < 50 ORDER BY Factory_Name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Factory_A;
SELECT factory_id, production_date, product_type FROM Factory_B WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT factory_id, production_date, product_type, worker_id FROM Factory_C ORDER BY production_date DESC;
SELECT factory_id, product_type, worker_id FROM Factory_D WHERE quantity < 5 ORDER BY factory_id ASC;
SELECT factory_id, quantity FROM Factory_E WHERE worker_id = 100 AND product_type = 'Widget';
SELECT * FROM Factory_A WHERE factory_id = 1;
SELECT factory_id, production_date, quantity FROM Factory_B WHERE product_type = 'Widget' ORDER BY production_date DESC;
SELECT AVG(quantity) AS avg_quantity, MAX(production_date) AS latest_production_date FROM Factory_C GROUP BY product_type;
SELECT factory_id, COUNT(worker_id) AS worker_count FROM Factory_D WHERE production_date > '2022-01-01' GROUP BY factory_id HAVING worker_count > 5;
SELECT factory_id, product_type, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM Factory_E GROUP BY factory_id, product_type ORDER BY factory_id, product_type ASC;
